metadata.title: CVE-2022-21691 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymouslyshare files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. Inaffected versions chat participants can spoof their channel leave message,tricking others into assuming they left the chatroom.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
